message.content: {"given_definition_quality":70,"better_definition":"cold; low in temperature","sentence":"今天冷。","image_prompt":"A simple scene in soft apocalypse animation style: a person (gender neutral) stands outside with visible breath, wearing a light jacket, shivering.
